thread.title: BRIEF-Liberty Oilfield Services Inc. Announces Q4 Pro Forma Earnings Per Share $0.30

title: BRIEF-Liberty Oilfield Services Inc. Announces Q4 Pro Forma Earnings Per Share $0.30
text: March 12, 2018 / 8:05 PM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-Liberty Oilfield Services Inc. Announces Q4 Pro Forma Earnings Per Share $0.30 Reuters Staff March 12 (Reuters) - Liberty Oilfield Services Inc: * . ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL AND OPERATIONAL RESULTS * Q4 PRO FORMA EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.30 * Q4 REVENUE $449 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $444.9 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.52 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * LIBERTY EXPECTS TO DEPLOY FLEET 22 ON A DEDICATED BASIS AT END OF Q2 OF 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
